cn.title: 关于比特派支持以太坊网络合并的公告

message.data: 以太坊网络预计于 9 月 15 日进行网络合并，比特派将支持以太坊合并，用户无需任何操作。
为保障用户资产安全，合并期间将暂停 ETH 收发、云钱包充提、ETH2/ETH交易等功能。
扩展说明：比特派为去中心化钱包，相关升级不影响用户的资产安全性。相关服务将在升级稳定后第一时间恢复，感谢您对比特派 Bitpie 的支持。

en.title: Announcement on support of Ethereum Merge

message.data: The Ethereum network is expected to undergo a network merge on September 15, and Bitpie will support the Ethereum merge.
In order to ensure the security of user assets, functions such as ETH sending and receiving、cloud wallet deposit and withdrawal、ETH2/ETH market will be suspended during the merge period.
Bitpie is a decentralized wallet, and related upgrades will not affect the security of users' assets.  Related services will be restored as soon as the upgrade is stable. Thank you for your support.
